channel.title: News on The Saiafarm Project
channel.description: Recent content in News on The Saiafarm Project

item.title: SaIAFarm is starting
item.description: For the start of the project, ITU spoke with Professor Yvonne Dittrich about the challenges ahead and how we plan to adapt satelite image analysis to support Mid-Himalayan farmers: Read the full article: in English or in Danish.
